```pddl
(:action knit
    :parameters (?p - player ?loc - location ?item1 - object ?item2 - object ?item3 - object)
    :precondition (and 
        (at ?p ?loc)
        (inventory ?p ?item1)
        (or (and (inventory ?p ?item2) (length ?item1 84)) 
            (inventory ?p ?item3)
            (inventory ?p ?item2))
    )
    :effect (and 
        (knitted ?item1)
        (not (inventory ?p ?item1))
    )
)

(:action join
    :parameters (?p - player ?loc - location ?composite - object ?component1 - object ?component2 - object)
    :precondition (and 
        (at ?p ?loc) 
        (inventory ?p ?component1) 
        (inventory ?p ?component2) 
        (form ?composite rectangular)
    )
    :effect (and 
        (joined ?composite) 
        (components_joined ?composite ?component1 ?component2)
    )
)

(:action draw_top
    :parameters (?p - player ?loc - location ?web - web ?needle - needle ?yarn_piece - yarn)
    :precondition (and 
        (at ?p ?loc) 
        (inventory ?p ?web) 
        (inventory ?p ?needle) 
        (inventory ?p ?yarn_piece) 
        (ends ?web joined)
    )
    :effect (and 
        (secured_top ?web) 
        (not (inventory ?p ?yarn_piece))
    )
)

(:action draw
    :parameters (?p - player ?loc - location ?resource - resource ?tool - tool ?material - material)
    :precondition (and 
        (at ?p ?loc) 
        (inventory ?p ?resource) 
        (inventory ?p ?tool) 
        (inventory ?p ?material) 
        (ends ?resource joined)
    )
    :effect (and 
        (secured ?resource) 
        (not (inventory ?p ?material))
    )
)

(:action fasten
    :parameters (?p - player ?loc - location ?item1 - object ?item2 - object ?item3 - object ?item4 - object)
    :precondition (and 
        (at ?p ?loc) 
        (inventory ?p ?item1) 
        (inventory ?p ?item2)
        (inventory ?p ?item3)
        (inventory ?p ?item4)
        (or 
            (and (yarn ?item1) (not (knitted ?item1))) 
            (and (web ?item1) (length ?item1 84) (not (sewn ?item1))) 
            (and (web ?item1) (sewn ?item1) (not (joined ?item1))) 
            (and (web ?item1) (joined ?item1) (not (secured ?item1))) 
            (and (yarn ?item1) (not (cord ?item1))) 
            (and (cord ?item1) (not (fastened ?item2)))
        )
    )
    :effect (and 
        (or 
            (and (yarn ?item1) (knitted ?item1) (length ?item1 84) (not (inventory ?p ?item1)))
            (and (web ?item1) (sewn ?item1) (joined ?item1) (secured ?item1) (not (inventory ?p ?item1)))
            (and (cord ?item1) (fastened ?item2) (not (inventory ?p ?item2)))
        )
    )
)
```
